task.title: Locking Objects
task.shortdesc: Locking object stops people from editing them. Only the uploader or administrator can unlock the object for public editing. If an object is unlocked, it will have an lock option on the menu bar.

taskbody.context: When modifying the metadata of an object (i.e. editing the MODS datastream) and when editing an XML document in CWRC Writer, the lock is automatically added by the system. If the lock is required and has not been automatically added, this message will appear.

step.cmd: Click on the Lock button in the menu bar.

taskbody.result: This takes you back to the datastream page where a banner informs the user that they have set the lock. If you would like to unlock this object or have accidentally added a lock, you can click on the Unlock button in the menu bar.
